Background.text: In itself benign, no treatment necessary

Clinical_Features.text:
Light tan to black
rash
Round, oval
Flat to elevated, verrucous
Velvety, waxy, "stuck-on" appearance

Leser-Trelat_Sign.text:
Requires follow up for malignancy workup
New onset diffuse lesions
Tends towards trunk by may involve:
Neck
Axilla
Groin
Associated with other paraneoplastic derm signs:
Malignant
acanthosis nigricans
(more classically associated with internal malignancy)
Florid cutaneous papillomatosis
Eruptive capillary angiomas

Dark_raised_skin_lesions.text:
Acanthosis nigricans
Kaposi's sarcoma
Melanoma
Nevus
Seborrheic keratosis
